thread.title: Antibiotic-resistant gene discovered in soil bacterium that commonly infects foals (The University of Georgia)

author: wn.com
title: Antibiotic-resistant gene discovered in soil bacterium that commonly infects foals (The University of Georgia)
text: ( Source : The University of Georgia ) Athens , Ga. - A research team based in the University of Georgia College of Veterinary Medicine has discovered a novel gene-erm(46)-that confers antibiotic resistance in Rhodococcus equi , a soil-dwelling
